name: kiste
description: A cross platform desktop player for Google Play Music

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: npm test && npm run clean:osx && electron-packager . "Kiste" --out=build/osx/ --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.35.0 --icon=assets/osx/icon.icns --ignore="dist|build|specs|assets|circle"
scripts.build:win: npm test && npm run clean:win && electron-packager . "Kiste" --out=build/win/ --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.35.0 --icon=assets/win/icon.ico --ignore="dist|build|specs|assets|circle"
scripts.pack: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
